mapper.sql: component_id, component_name, component_num, component_type, component_size, bind_status, expedit_status, expedit_date, component_status_id, check_res, single_name, pro_id, floor, plan_begin_date, plan_end_date, real_begin_date, real_end_date, order_num, comp_factory_id, order_user_id, order_time, product_plan_begin_date, product_plan_end_date, drawing
mapper.select: SELECT component_num,component_type,component_size,single_name,floor, pro_name from component AS c LEFT JOIN project AS p ON c.pro_id = p.pro_id WHERE component_num=#{component_num}
mapper.insert: insert into component (component_id, component_name, component_num, component_type, component_size, bind_status, expedit_status, expedit_date, component_status_id, check_res, single_name, pro_id, floor, plan_begin_date, plan_end_date, real_begin_date, real_end_date, order_num, comp_factory_id, order_user_id, order_time, product_plan_begin_date, product_plan_end_date, drawing) values (#{component_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{component_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{component_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{component_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{component_size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bind_status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{expedit_status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{expedit_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{component_status_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{check_res,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{single_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pro_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{floor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plan_begin_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{plan_end_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{real_begin_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{real_end_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{order_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comp_factory_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order_user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{product_plan_begin_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{product_plan_end_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{drawing,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update component set component_name = #{component_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, component_num = #{component_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, component_type = #{component_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, component_size = #{component_size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bind_status = #{bind_status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, expedit_status = #{expedit_status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, expedit_date = #{expedit_date,jdbcType=DATE}, component_status_id = #{component_status_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, check_res = #{check_res,jdbcType=INTEGER}, single_name = #{single_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_id = #{pro_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, floor = #{floor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_begin_date = #{plan_begin_date,jdbcType=DATE}, plan_end_date = #{plan_end_date,jdbcType=DATE}, real_begin_date = #{real_begin_date,jdbcType=DATE}, real_end_date = #{real_end_date,jdbcType=DATE}, order_num = #{order_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comp_factory_id = #{comp_factory_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_user_id = #{order_user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_time = #{order_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, product_plan_begin_date = #{product_plan_begin_date,jdbcType=DATE}, product_plan_end_date = #{product_plan_end_date,jdbcType=DATE}, drawing = #{drawing,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where component_id = #{component_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT p.pro_name, c.single_name, c.floor, c.plan_begin_date, c.plan_end_date, c.real_begin_date, c.real_end_date, c.component_num, c.component_name, c.component_size, s.component_status_name,c.bind_status, c.expedit_status, c.expedit_date, c.order_num, c.component_id, f.comp_factory_name,u.user_name, c.order_date, c.product_plan_begin_date, c.product_plan_end_date, c.drawing, c.picture_comp_make, c.picture_product_accept, c.picture_receipt, c.picture_install,c.component_status_id FROM component AS c LEFT JOIN project AS p ON c.pro_id=p.pro_id LEFT JOIN component_status AS s ON c.component_status_id=s.component_status_id LEFT JOIN comp_factory AS f ON c.comp_factory_id=f.comp_factory_id LEFT JOIN sys_user AS u ON c.order_user_id=u.user_id WHERE component_id=#{component_id}

SELECT DISTINCT(single_name), pro_id FROM component
WHERE pro_id=#{pro_id}
SELECT DISTINCT(component_type) from component WHERE component_type is not null AND component_type !=''

SELECT component_id,component_name,component_num,component_type,component_size FROM component WHERE component_id in
#{item}

SELECT c.component_num,c.order_num, c.product_plan_begin_date, c.product_plan_end_date,c.plan_end_date,c.expedit_date FROM component AS c WHERE 1=1
and c.order_num=#{order_num}
mapper.update: update component SET product_plan_begin_date = #{product_plan_begin_date}, product_plan_end_date = #{product_plan_end_date}, product_explain = #{product_explain}, component_status_id = 3 where component_status_id=2 and component_id = #{component_id}
mapper.select:
select * from component WHERE 1=1
AND card_num=#{cardNum}

SELECT drawing FROM component WHERE drawing is not null AND drawing!=''
and pro_id=#{pro_id}
SELECT component_num from component WHERE component_num=#{component_num}
